headline: Two foundations. Four ways to help.
subheadline: Choose the infrastructure you need. Start with one, add the other, or build both together.

mainServices.title: Web & Brand Systems
mainServices.description: Your website is how you're judged before you speak. We build digital presence that matches your expertise, from focused landing pages to comprehensive brand systems.
mainServices.problemText: First impressions that raise questions. Credibility gaps. Touchpoints that feel improvised, not intentional.
benefits: A polished, brand-aligned site that builds instant trust and credibility
Fast, mobile-optimized pages you're proud to share with prospects
Seamless contact forms and basic CRM integration for smoother leads
A professional foundation that positions you as the established expert

options.title: Essential Presence
items: Contact form with basic CRM connection

options.title: Complete Presence
items: Advanced forms with CRM connection and lead scoring
Content strategy and SEO keyword research

mainServices.title: Automation & AI Systems
mainServices.description: Manual reporting shouldn't consume your week. Client updates shouldn't pile up. We build systems that eliminate repetitive tasks and give you real-time visibility into operations.
mainServices.problemText: Manual data entry. Context-switching between strategy and execution. Scattered tools that don't talk to each other.
benefits: Automated workflows that reclaim hours from manual tasks
Real-time dashboard with clear visibility into operations
Integrated tools that finally sync and communicate seamlessly
More focus on strategy, clients, and growth, instead of admin

options.title: Essential Flows
items: 1-2 automated workflows designed for your process

options.title: Operational Intelligence
items: Multi-stage client onboarding and cross-platform reporting
Real-time dashboard with custom role views

supportingServices.title: Calm Clarity Audit
supportingServices.description: We'll audit your website, CRM, automations, and workflows—then show you exactly what's broken, what's working, and what to fix first.
details: First impression analysis (what signals are you sending?)
UX friction points (where do visitors drop off?)
supportingServices.note: Audit fee applied to the project total if you move forward within 60 days.

supportingServices.title: Steady Growth Plan
supportingServices.description: Monthly audits, enhancement sprints, quarterly strategy sessions, and priority support keep your infrastructure growing.

bundle.title: Build together, save 15-20%
bundle.text: When you build web and automation as one project, they're architected to work together from day one—and you save on the total investment.

cta.title: Not sure which service fits your needs?
cta.text: Book a call. We'll diagnose your situation and recommend the right approach.
